artist: Designer: Unknown designers and cartoonists, Flanders
text: Hunters and their dogs relax after the hunt. One man warms his hands by the fire. Another, in the distance, shields his face from the flames as he walks away with a roast leg from the dayâ€™s take. In the lower left corner, a wine flask cools in a stream for the celebratory feast.
title: The End of the Hunt
